__e: I don't know what I'm looking for... but if there are clues as to who really killed Lilly... then they're in Dad's safe.
There may be five or six grand in Tony's safe every night... sittin' in there, while we're out here getting paid dick to mess with this shit.
I didn't trust myself with the gun in the house, so Val locked it up in her husband's safe until I was ready to have it back.
